did.abstract: Two membership receipts issued to Cyrus Pyle, one from the Long Island Historical Society, dating from 1867, and one from the Mercantile Library Association of Brooklyn, dating from 1868.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of George H. Gray, 1951 and 1955.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The two items in this collection are housed in a single folder.

bioghist.head: Biographical note
bioghist.p: Cyrus Pyle (1834-1909) was a resident of Brooklyn, N.Y., where he operated a chain of retail pharmacies.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Cyrus Pyle membership receipts, 1977.369, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level. This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Two membership receipts issued to Cyrus Pyle, one from the Long Island Historical Society (later the Brooklyn Historical Society and then the Center for Brooklyn History), dating from 1867, and one from the Mercantile Library Association of Brooklyn, dating from 1868.
